extendedInfo.description: Marble Mania is the #1 deliciously addicting puzzle adventure with wacky characters and mind-bending experience suitable for all ages!The goal of Marble Mania is to eliminate all of the marble balls rolling around the screen along a given path before these marble balls reach the mysterious hole. You need to fire colored marbles from the wacky characters towards the chain of marbles. The marbles will disappear if three or more marbles of the same color come in contact.Marble Mania is easy for all ages to pick up and play, but challenging for the longtime zuma fans to master. Aim, fire and clear your way through this thrilling fun game now!How to Play:- Touch anywhere on the screen to shoot the marbles- Match 3 or more marbles to eliminate them- Tap the wacky characters in the center to switch the marblesGame Features:- 60 levels with more to come- Simple one-touch controls- Unique wacky characters and outstanding graphics

reviews.title: U love the gsne!! 8*)
reviews.comment: Very addicting an enjoyable.  Fills my time constructively an helps me enjoy my phone better!
reviews.author: Raymond Smith

reviews.title: Waste of time.
reviews.comment: Wont let me throw the balls at all never made it past level 1. Graphics are cheap looking. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: LaVeenya Cooper

reviews.title: Marble Fun
reviews.comment: How good are you at shutting marbles... remember? Well is what kind of game this reminds me of... fun and builds the mind. Hours of think!
reviews.author: David La Lone

reviews.title: Super relaxing
reviews.comment: I played all the way to the end. :\'( Please add more lvls!! Love playing this in spare time with some tunes in the background.
reviews.author: Candice C

reviews.title: zenador I\'m addicted
reviews.comment: I like it.  But i don\'t know what causes me to earn.... or not earn... stars. Help!
reviews.author: Janet Gourley

reviews.title: Poor graphics
reviews.comment: These guys must have a look at Luxor for  how it should be done. Graphics are mediocre, there is poor foreground/background contrast which makes the balls difficult to see and it just not polished.  Sad that game companies vomit these quality games out and expect people to enjoy it.
reviews.author: Cobus Steyn

reviews.title: Easily addictive
reviews.comment: Easy to become addicted to & great way to pass time. Never have any problems with it freezing or quitting unexpectedly like some other games
reviews.author: Rebecca J

reviews.title: Samsung Transform Ultra
reviews.comment: Very addictive I LOVE IT!!
reviews.author: Floyd Nunnery

reviews.title: Suziq
reviews.comment: Not bad fast paced and somewhat of a challenge
reviews.author: Sue Fordham

reviews.title: Fun free game
reviews.comment: Hours of fun. Just ran out of levels to play too quickly.
reviews.author: Niel Mostert

reviews.title: Love this game
reviews.comment: Already on level 28 have had no problems with it
reviews.author: Robin Gray

reviews.title: Fun But Glitchy
reviews.comment: This game is fun but the ball thrower freezes in the middle of a game or the balls go in the wrong direction. The glitches outweigh the fun. I\'m considering uninstalling.
reviews.author: Myrtle McDonald

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: This game is great time killer
reviews.author: Anthony Apodaca

reviews.title: Wonderful addicting time consuming
reviews.comment: Quick moving game.great to play for a few while standing in line at grocery store or dmv. Great job Italy!
reviews.author: Robin Sue

reviews.title: Marvelous!
reviews.comment: Just when I had given up on puzzle type games in the Google store, I found this little gem. This game is cute, incredibly fun, and the perfect amount of challenging. Definitely recommend to anyone looking for something fun and unique!
reviews.author: Aerial Miller

reviews.title: Good until...
reviews.comment: I agree with another user everything is fine until you reach the third level then you can\'t shoot or it shoots the wrong way. Was enjoying until then but I\'m deleting the game now since its no longer any fun.  Very disappointing as I was hooked too.
reviews.author: Kathy E

reviews.title: Poor difficulty curve and controls
reviews.comment: The game starts out really easy which is fine but fairly quickly it becomes tedious to try and beat levels. I can\'t even imagine what hell hard mode would put me through. While tapping shoots in the right direction, holding down for precision aiming is completely inaccurate. Also, it\'s not obvious what rules dictate marble movements of disconnected segments. Overall... Good potential but frustrating for the wrong reasons.
reviews.author: Ryan Gore

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Awesome game very addictive. Didnt have no problems with but wish it had more levels.
reviews.author: Albert Rojas

reviews.title: The game glitches a lot.
reviews.comment: Around the third \"zone\" the game is infinitely harder and just when you think you\'re about to beat one of these harder stages the game will glitch and either not let you shoot the marbles or they\'ll shoot out behing you, go super slow and pass through any marbles they come in contact with.
reviews.author: Ryan Echols

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: Good game
reviews.author: Josh Lund
